text: tame kahi do ke tamara bhagidaromam ko'i evo che je satya marga tarapha margadarsana apato hoya? Tame kahi do ke allaha ja satya tarapha margadarsana ape che, to pachi je vyakti satya tarapha margadarsana apato hoya te anusarana karava mate vadhum yogya che athava te vyakti jene batavya vagara pote ja margadarsana na melave? Basa! Tamane sum tha'i gayum che tame keva nirnaya karo cho
